prompts: Create an aquatic Pokemon that resembles a fish with colorful patterns and a unique shape.
Generate a whimsical water-type Pokemon with a round body and playful features.
Show me a small, non-legendary Pokemon that has a beautiful coloration and swims gracefully.

Design a Pokemon with a unique pattern and a charming personality, perfect for a water-themed team.

Give me an image of a quirky fish Pokemon with a simple yet appealing design.
